files.name: tsconfig.app.json
files.purpose: This file is a TypeScript configuration file (`tsconfig.json`) specifically for an application. It defines how the TypeScript compiler should compile the application's source code, including target JavaScript version, module resolution, and linting rules.

files.name: package-lock.json
files.purpose: This file is a `package-lock.json` file, automatically generated by npm. Its primary purpose is to record the exact versions and dependency tree of all installed packages (both direct and transitive) for the 'vite_react_shadcn_ts' project. This ensures that anyone installing the project dependencies will get the identical set of packages, leading to consistent builds across different environments.

files.purpose: This file is the root TypeScript configuration file for a project. Its primary purpose is to define global compiler options and reference other more specific TypeScript configuration files, allowing for a modular and organized project setup.

files.name: index.html
files.purpose: This file serves as the main entry point for a web application named 'Agentboostr - AI原生孵化器平台' (AI-native incubator platform). It sets up the basic HTML structure, metadata for SEO and social media sharing, and acts as a container for a client-side application.
